department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description:
One panel huipil. Red with grid pattern in pink, blue, green, yellow, purple and white; small geometric brocade designs at shoulders, front of chest and top of sleeves; short gathered sleeves with banded cuffs and band at collar.
Everyday huipil.
markings: Lender\'s info tag, sewn inside back of collar
medium: Cotton, acrylic; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
